version_description:
EMILY’S JOURNEY CONTINUES - EPISODE 3 ADDED!
40 new levels in beautiful Milano: prepare focaccias, pasta and other delicious dishes in a tradition Trattoria, and discover the amazing flavors of Italian cuisine!
Meet new characters Carlo and Alessandra as Emily embarks on a journey that will change her forever. Will she make it in time to Paris?
And also minor bugs fixed and small improvements added in previous episodes.
You can now link your game to your Facebook account and recover your progress on another device

SEASON 2 CONTINUES - EPISODE 2 ADDED!
- In this new episode, Emily needs to avoid being the first elimination of “Rising Chef” in a crêperie that’s practically falling to pieces!
- Turn the place around by improving the restaurant and cooking a wide variety of delicious crêpes!
- Now that Jean-Paul is back in Emily’s life, will she be able to juggle the contest and their relationship?

SEASON 2 KEEPS ROLLING - EPISODE 4 AVAILABLE NOW!

The whole troupe goes to Lyon! Join Emily’s team during the contest semifinals!
Prepare exquisite and elaborate recipes in a traditional bouchon - petit salé aux lentilles, poulet au vinaigre and more!
A secret exposed, a fierce competition... and Patrick is back! How will Emily deal with everything?

SEASON 2 FINALE - EPISODE 5 AVAILABLE NOW!

The grand final of "Rising Chef" has finally arrived... who will win it all?
It's time for dessert - café liegeois, macaroons, profiteroles and other sweet delights await you!
The stakes have never been higher as Emily's career and love life reach a nail-biting climax!

SEASON 3 BEGINS!

The story continues - the first episode of Season 3 is here!

After the ending of Season 2, a British pub in London seems like the perfect place for Emily to drown her sorrows...

Knock Shivani's engagement party out of the park with delicious fish and chips, roast beef... and lots of beer!

Season 3 continues with Episode 3, 'Goa Beach Resort'!

The most exciting bachelorette party is about to start in Goa, and what happens in Goa... stays in Goa.
Enjoy the beautiful beach and sun while preparing delicious Indian-Portuguese dishes such as crab xec xec and kokum sherbet.
An old character makes a return... Is it finally time for Emily to start dating again?

Season 3 continues with Episode 4, 'New Delhi Food Market'!

Stroll along the busy and lively streets of New Delhi for a Sangeet celebration full of food, music and BIG reveals!
Take a deep dive into the tastiest Indian street food, preparing a variety of kebab, chaad and many others.

Season 3 continues with Episode 4, 'New Delhi Food Market'!

Stroll along the busy and lively streets of New Delhi for a Sangeet celebration full of food, music and BIG reveals!
Take a deep dive into the tastiest Indian street food, preparing a variety of kebab, chaad and many others.

Season 3 reaches its heart-stopping climax in the Season Finale, 'Ludhiana Banquet Hall'!

A luxurious palace, a lavish banquet, glamorous guests... only the bride and groom are missing from the biggest wedding ever!
Emily will need to make a crucial decision as she sets her eyes on a new challenge in her career!

Season 3 reaches its heart-stopping climax in the Season Finale, 'Ludhiana Banquet Hall'!

A luxurious palace, a lavish banquet, glamorous guests... only the bride and groom are missing from the biggest wedding ever!
Emily will need to make a crucial decision as she sets her eyes on a new challenge in her career!

Season 3 reaches its heart-stopping climax in the Season Finale, 'Ludhiana Banquet Hall'!

A luxurious palace, a lavish banquet, glamorous guests... only the bride and groom are missing from the biggest wedding ever!
Emily will need to make a crucial decision as she sets her eyes on a new challenge in her career!

SEASON 4 BEGINS!

Konnichiwa! The story continues with the first episode of Season 4, 'Okinawa Sweet Shop'!
A huge job opportunity awaits Emily and Sarah in Japan... If they don't kill each other first!
Sweeten the mood preparing mochi, dorayaki and other Japanese sweets in beautiful Okinawa!

Season 4 continues with Episode 2, 'Kyoto Izakaya'!
Stranded in a strange land... Emily has no choice but to search for answers at a lively tavern in Kyoto!
Mingle with the locals and discover popular Japanese food like gyoza, yakisoba, and more!

Season 4 continues with Episode 3, 'Takayama Sushi Restaurant'!

A strict sushi master is the least of Emily's worries when a certain someone shows up in Japan...

Maki, nigiri, sashimi... Mastering the art of sushi will require focus and total dedication!

Season 4 continues with Episode 4, 'Kamikochi Ramen Inn'!

Emily and Sarah reach their long-awaited destination... but the welcome is far from what they'd expected!

Embark on a quest to find a long-lost ramen recipe in the magnificent Japanese alps.

Thank you so much for all your support during the first year of Delicious World! We’ve prepared new events, challenges, and special rewards so you can celebrate with us all month long! We hope you enjoy it!

After a devastating heartbreak, Emily is back in Snuggford...

Just as Emily thinks her adventures are over for good, Frank shows up and turns everything upside down!

Get ready for a cross-country road trip with juicy relationship developments, exciting new characters and iconic American backdrops!

Season 5 continues with Episode 2, “Las Vegas Buffet”.

Help Emily win a high-stakes bet by taking over the casino’s extravagant buffet to serve steaks, cocktails and delicious barbecued fare.

Will Emily be able to get Frank out of an unbelievable bind?

Season 5 continues with Episode 3, “Red Ridge Reservation”.

Uncover secrets of traditional Diné cuisine in Kai Descheny’s workshops.

Is this talented and handsome chef really linked to the theft of Frank’s chips?

Season 5 continues with Episode 4, “Queenie’s Diner”.

Emily and Frank infiltrate a famous fast food chain to uncover their darkest secret!

Welcome to Queenie's: a wonderland of burgers and weenies!

Season 5 continues with Episode 4, “Queenie’s Diner”.

Emily and Frank infiltrate a famous fast food chain to uncover their darkest secret!

Welcome to Queenie's: a wonderland of burgers and weenies!

Season 5 continues with Episode 4, “Queenie’s Diner”.

Emily and Frank infiltrate a famous fast food chain to uncover their darkest secret!

Welcome to Queenie's: a wonderland of burgers and weenies!

Enjoy an action-packed season finale at the “Bayou Shrimp Shack”.

The culprit is revealed! Will Frank finally recover his chips and achieve his dream?

As old flames are dangerously stoked, Emily will have to figure things out one bowl of gumbo at a time!

The story continues with the first episode of Season 6, “National Museum of Mexico”

Emily is about to embark on a new adventure with Kai... Will things work out as she hopes?

Dive into Mexican cuisine with guacamole, chiles en nogada and other delicious appetizers.

Season 6 continues with Episode 2, “Taquería Puebla”.

The journey to find the recipe of everlasting love is threatened by a powerful curse?!

Prepare tacos, tamales and flautas in a traditional taqueria!

Season 6 continues with Episode 3, “Mezcalería Oaxaca”.

The adventurous group follow in Rosalia's path and end up at a mysterious Hacienda on the “Day of the Dead”! What spooky twists and turns await the trio?

Prepare pozole, sip mezcal and crunch down on mouth-watering nachos in this charming mezcaleria!

Season 6 continues with Episode 4, “Puerto Escondido”.

With Kai fighting for his life, Emily and Maite must overcome their differences and convince the healer to help them before it's too late!

Taste some tongue-tingling Tepache and quaff Quesadillas in this beautiful beach paradise.

Emily's new adventure begins with the first episode of Season 7, “Lenny's pizza joint”!

Emily heads to at Frank's pad in New York, ready to enjoy single life in the big city... but it's Patrick who opens the door!

Immerse yourself in an emblematic neighborhood pizza joint and revel in this season's authentic New Yorker humor!

Emily's new adventure begins with the first episode of Season 7, “Lenny's pizza joint”!

Emily heads to at Frank's pad in New York, ready to enjoy single life in the big city... but it's Patrick who opens the door!

Immerse yourself in an emblematic neighborhood pizza joint and revel in this season's authentic New Yorker humor!

Season 7 continues with Episode 3, “Precision”.

Sparks fly when Emily finds herself back in the kitchen with her best frenemy, Sarah!

Learn the art of precision cooking with Sarah's wild combinations! Anyone tried Roast Duck Sorbet?!
